No.-242446)} Sub: Appraisal of BOT (Toll) Projects through PPP Division reg: In continuation of Policy Circular No.3.6.13/2023 dated 06.10.2023 and  Policy Circular No.3.6.14/2023 dated 09.10.2023, an exclusive PATSC (BOT) has been set up with the approval of Chairman for appraisal of BOT (Toll) Projects across the country with the following composition: (_) Member (PPP) Convenor (ii) Member concerned (iii) CGM (Fin:) dealing with BOT projects in Finance Division (iv) CGM (Legal) (v) CGM concerned with BOT Project (vi) Advisor (Tech) - Sh. I.S. Rana (vii) One Representative of Niti Aayog (viii) One Representative of Adviser (Cost) [Sh: Vijay Kumar, Director (Cost)] (ix) Advisor / Consultant (Technical, Traffic, etc.), if required, on case to case basis. 2 _ In case of BOT Projects in the states under Member (PPP), Member (Fin:) is the convenor of above PATSC (BOT) Above PATSC  (BOT) will be assisted by one Chartered Accountant for thorough financial analysis & one Advocate for thorough checking of Legal Documents (DCA/ RFP). 3. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: o3l24 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
